item.title: What I do when I am stuck
item.author: naeemh1396@gmail.com (Naeem Hasan)
item.description: Everyone gets stuck. Even the genius you always envied struggles with something. Some are quick to recover. That’s good. Some take time, that’s good too. But to give up? Heck no, that’s not good. So what do I do when I am stuck? Well, I like to follow a certain procedure. Know thy problem: If you don’t know your problem well, that makes it so obvious why you’re stuck. You have to have a good understanding of the problem, and what you’re trying to accomplish.
